# Pull Request Checklist
- [ ] `pnpm -r lint`, `pnpm -r typecheck`, and `pnpm -r test -- --coverage` all pass
- [ ] Backend and frontend `pnpm -w build` succeed
- [ ] Docs updated (AUTHâ€¦ PLAN, TESTING, OPERATIONS, or other referenced runbooks)
- [ ] `.env.example` reflects any new or changed environment variables
